pages.title: Taison Engagement Interface

hero.h1: One brand. One promise. Zero client complexity.
hero.subhead: Daijavu is the build interface that routes you into a unified TAISON engagement—without making you learn our internal machinery.
hero.micro_clarity: 2 minutes. No commitment. You’ll know the next step.
hero.cta_helper: Submit context → we return the recommended path.

laws: Routing is internal complexity, never client burden.
